    • resetCar

      @Action(name="resetCar", layer=SCENARIO, description="Moves the driving car to the given reset point", defaultDelay=0.0f, defaultRepeat=0, param=@Parameter(name="resetPointID",type="String",defaultValue="resetPoint01",description="ID of the reset point to move the driving car to")) public TriggerAction resetCar​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
      Creates a ResetCar trigger action by parsing the node list for the name of the reset point to place the car when the trigger was hit.
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
      parameterList - List of additional parameters.
      Returns:
      ResetCar trigger action with the name of the reset point to move the car to.

    • moveTraffic

      @Action(name="moveTraffic",layer=SCENARIO,description="Moves a traffic vehicle to the given way point",defaultDelay=0.0f,defaultRepeat=0,param={@Parameter(name="trafficObjectID",type="String",defaultValue="trafficObject01",description="ID of the traffic vehicle to move"),@Parameter(name="wayPointID",type="String",defaultValue="wayPoint01",description="ID of the way point to move the traffic vehicle to")}) public TriggerAction moveTraffic​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
      Creates a MoveTraffic trigger action list by parsing the node list for the name of the traffic object to move and the ID of the target way point.
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
      parameterList - List of additional parameters.
      Returns:
      MoveTraffic trigger action list with name of the traffic object(s) and ID of the way point.

    • setODCarTargetLane

      @Action(name="setODCarTargetLane",layer=SCENARIO,description="Assigns a given target lane to the given OpenDRIVECar",defaultDelay=0.0f,defaultRepeat=0,param={@Parameter(name="trafficObjectID",type="String",defaultValue="null",description="ID of the traffic vehicle to assign a target lane to. If not set, steering car will be used instead"),@Parameter(name="laneID",type="Integer",defaultValue="0",description="ID of the target lane")}) public TriggerAction setODCarTargetLane​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
      Creates a SetODCarTargetLane trigger action to assign a given target lane to the given OpenDRIVECar (or steering car if not set).
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
      parameterList - List of additional parameters.
      Returns:
      SetODCarTargetLane trigger action with name of the traffic object and ID of its target lane.

    • changeLaneODCar

      @Action(name="changeLaneODCar",layer=SCENARIO,description="Assigns a lane change instruction to the given OpenDRIVECar",defaultDelay=0.0f,defaultRepeat=0,param={@Parameter(name="trafficObjectID",type="String",defaultValue="null",description="ID of the traffic vehicle to assign lane change instruction. If not set, steering car will be used instead"),@Parameter(name="lanePos",type="String",defaultValue="null",description="Position of the target lane (Left, Right)")}) public TriggerAction changeLaneODCar​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
      Creates a ChangeLaneODCar trigger action to assign a lane change to the given OpenDRIVECar (or steering car if not set).
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
      parameterList - List of additional parameters.
      Returns:
      ChangeLaneODCar trigger action with name of the traffic object and lane change instruction (left, right).

    • changeVehicleLayout

      @Action(name="changeVehicleLayout",layer=SCENARIO,description="Assigns a layout to the given traffic object",defaultDelay=0.0f,defaultRepeat=0,param={@Parameter(name="trafficObjectID",type="String",defaultValue="null",description="ID of the traffic vehicle to assign layout. If not set, steering car will be used instead"),@Parameter(name="layoutName",type="String",defaultValue="null",description="Name of the layout")}) public TriggerAction changeVehicleLayout​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
      Creates a ChangeVehicleLayout trigger action to assign a layout (=set of textures) to the given traffic vehicle (or steering car if not set).
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
      parameterList - List of additional parameters.
      Returns:
      ChangeVehicleLayout trigger action with name of the traffic object and layout name.

    • startPresentationTask

      public TriggerAction startPresentationTask​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
      Creates a PresentationTask trigger action by parsing the node list for SIM-TD presentation models. As soon as the trigger is hit, the presentation task will be displayed in the HMI GUI.
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
      parameterList - List of additional parameters.
      Returns:
      PresentationTask trigger action with the presentation model.

    • setCurrentSpeedLimit

      @Action(name="setCurrentSpeedLimit", layer=SCENARIO, description="Sets the speed limit to the given value", defaultDelay=0.0f, defaultRepeat=0, param=@Parameter(name="speedLimit",type="Integer",defaultValue="0",description="Speed limit in kph (0 = unlimited)")) public TriggerAction setCurrentSpeedLimit​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
      Creates a SetSpeedLimit trigger action by parsing the given node list. This trigger sets the global variable "currentSpeedLimit" (e.g. used by the simulator's speed indicator) to the given value.
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
      parameterList - List of additional parameters.
      Returns:
      SetSpeedLimit trigger action with the given speed limit value.

    • setUpcomingSpeedLimit

      @Action(name="setUpcomingSpeedLimit", layer=SCENARIO, description="Sets the upcoming speed limit to the given value", defaultDelay=0.0f, defaultRepeat=0, param=@Parameter(name="speedLimit",type="Integer",defaultValue="0",description="Speed limit in kph (0 = unlimited)")) public TriggerAction setUpcomingSpeedLimit​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
      Creates a SetSpeedLimit trigger action by parsing the given node list. This trigger sets the global variable "upcomingSpeedLimit" (e.g. used by the RoadWorksInformation presentation model) to the given value.
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
      parameterList - List of additional parameters.
      Returns:
      SetSpeedLimit trigger action with the given speed limit value.

    • measureTimeUntilBrake

      @Action(name="measureTimeUntilBrake", layer=SCENARIO, description="Measures time until brake was applied", defaultDelay=0.0f, defaultRepeat=0, param=@Parameter(name="triggerName",type="String",defaultValue="trigger01",description="ID of trigger for identification in output file")) public TriggerAction measureTimeUntilBrake​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
      Creates a GetTimeUntilBrake trigger action by parsing the given node list. Time from hitting the trigger until the driver brakes will be recorded.
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
      parameterList - List of additional parameters.
      Returns:
      GetTimeUntilBrake trigger action.

    • measureTimeUntilSpeedChange

      @Action(name="measureTimeUntilSpeedChange",layer=SCENARIO,description="Measures time until speed was changed by the given amount",defaultDelay=0.0f,defaultRepeat=0,param={@Parameter(name="triggerName",type="String",defaultValue="trigger01",description="ID of trigger for identification in output file"),@Parameter(name="speedChange",type="Integer",defaultValue="20",description="Amount of speed (in kph) that has to be in- or decreased")}) public TriggerAction measureTimeUntilSpeedChange​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
      Creates a GetTimeUntilSpeedChange trigger action by parsing the given node list. Time from hitting the trigger until the car reached the given speed change.
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
      parameterList - List of additional parameters.
      Returns:
      GetTimeUntilSpeedChange trigger action.

    • stopMovie

      @Action(name="stopMovie", layer=SCENE, description="Stops movie playback", defaultDelay=0.0f, defaultRepeat=0, param={}) public TriggerAction stopMovie​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
      Stop playing the current movie file.
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
      parameterList - List of additional parameters.
      Returns:
      StopMovie trigger action.
